Getting Started
==================

*Getting started*

Go to 
`read the docs link <https://readthedocs.org/#hyperlinks>`__

and make an account with github

For more information see the official sphinx `documentation <https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/stable/index.html/#hyperlinks>`__


1. Go to setting Import a project and import the github project

2. Go to github -> settings webhooks and it should be there, when you push to main
   it will update the documentation (see the builds)

3. see the view docs
